Posts.Content: sheila45 wrote: Hi ladies, I had a lumpectomy on the left side for a 4mm DCIS- Intermediate level 7 weeks ago. It's been couple of days that I feel my lymph nodes are enlarged and painful in my right armpit. Can it be true that it is something serious? Any thoughts? I appreciate your replies! Posts.Title: DCIS and lymph node enlargement in the other side? sheila45 sheila45

Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2012 09:22PM sheila45 wrote: Thanks Cathy and Binney, My oncologist has been busy in the last couple of days and I didn't get to see him. I'll have him check me next week but thanks for assuring me it might only be a simple not-cancer-related thing!Â  I didn't have lymph node surgery nor rads. I've decided to go with mastectomy as there are more suspicious areas in my breasts and I'm tired of biopsies, MRIs, mammos and .. Enjoy your weekend! Sheila- Toronto
